./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_dff_reset_en.v Cov: 100% 

   1: /**
   2:  *  bsg_dff_reset_en.v
   3:  */
   4: 
   5: module bsg_dff_reset_en
   6:   #(parameter width_p="inv"
   7:     , parameter reset_val_p=0
   8:     , parameter harden_p=0
   9:   )
  10:   (
  11:     input clk_i
  12:     , input reset_i
  13:     , input en_i
  14:     , input [width_p-1:0] data_i
  15:     , output logic [width_p-1:0] data_o
  16:   );
  17: 
  18:   logic  [width_p-1:0] data_r;
  19: 
  20:   assign data_o = data_r;
  21: 
  22:   always_ff @ (posedge clk_i) begin
  23:     if (reset_i) begin
  24:       data_r <= width_p'(reset_val_p);
  25:     end
  26:     else begin
  27:       if (en_i) begin
  28:         data_r <= data_i;
  29:       end
  30:     end
  31:   end
  32: 
  33: endmodule
  34:
